::DOMNIJOE AND BLINDCHAOS::

    Domnijoe sneered at Firestrike.
    "Sorry Bub." she snapped. "I've been with enough morons to ignore 
idiots like you. Megatron knows how to do things and DO THEM RIGHT." 
She crossed her arms across he chest defiantly. "My vote stays with 
him. I didn't leave one group of slag heads to be lead by another."
    Blinchaos raised his hands defensively in the air.
    "I'm saying out of this." he said and took a step back.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

**************************


> FireStrike arrived back where Megatron was.  "Can't take care of him
